frog.util

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • frog.util.Button

  • public class Button
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Button on the screen. To use, implement ButtonListener and add it to the Button.
    Author:
    Justin Hwang

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT 
      static int HOVERED 
      static int PRESSED 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Button(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Constructor for new Button inside of a ButtonListener with given dimensions.
      Button(int x, int y, int width, int height, int radius)
      Constructor for new Button with given dimensions AND radius Default mainColor & hoveredColor = Green Default pressedColor = White; Default border & text color (main, hovered, and pressed) = Black Default border weight = 5 Default text size = 15 Default text is "Button"
      Button(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Button

        public Button(int x,
              int y,
              int width,
              int height)
        Constructor for new Button inside of a ButtonListener with given dimensions. Default radius = 12 Default mainColor & hoveredColor = Green Default pressedColor = White; Default border & text color (main, hovered, and pressed) = Black Default border weight = 5 Default text size = 15 Default text is "Button"
        Parameters:
        x - X coord of top left corner
        y - Y coord of top left corner
        width - Width of Button
        height - Height of Button

      • Button

        public Button(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)

      • Button

        public Button(int x,
              int y,
              int width,
              int height,
              int radius)
        Constructor for new Button with given dimensions AND radius Default mainColor & hoveredColor = Green Default pressedColor = White; Default border & text color (main, hovered, and pressed) = Black Default border weight = 5 Default text size = 15 Default text is "Button"
        Parameters:
        x - X coord of top left corner
        y - Y coord of top left corner
        width - Width of Button
        height - Height of Button
        radius - Radius of Button's corners

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws the Button
        Postconditions:
        PApplet ends with the same style that it starts with

      • update

        public void update(int mouseX,
                   int mouseY,
                   boolean mousePressed)
        Updates the Button with the new mouse info
        Parameters:
        mouseX - x-coord of the mouse, using actual coords, not assumed
        mouseY - y-coord of the mouse, using actual coords, not assumed
        mousePressed - True if mouse is currently pressed, false if not

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(int x,
                             int y)
        Returns true if given coordinates are inside Button, false if not
        Parameters:
        x - x-coord of point to check
        y - y-coord of point to check
        Returns:
        True if given coordinates are inside Button, false if not

        Parameters:
